title: Battlefield Ambiances Pro
description: 70, 2 Minute long Ambiances/Loops that will put you in the battlefield!
longDescription:
> LISTEN HERE <

> View The File List <

*All Loops Loop Seamlessly and are around 2 Minute long (140 minute total playtime!)

﻿* Add $13 and get our Ultimate SFX Bundle (9k+ Sounds) which includes all of our current and future packs! *


In this pack you will find 70 professionally recorded warfare loops that will cover everything your next shooter or action game will need when it comes to ambiances/loops from full blown battlefields to caves caves and base breaches you will find everything that you will ever need!


In this pack you will find 70 Seamlessly looping ambiances/loops including:

  • Urban Battlefield At Day/Night
  • Distant Battle At Day/Night
  • Forest Battlefield At Day/Night
  • Base Breach At Day/Night
  • Base At Day/Night
  • And Much more!


All the loops were carefully mixed and mastered by a professional sound engineer.
technicalDetails:
https://soundcloud.com/sidearmstudios/battlefield-ambiancesloops


Number of Audio Waves: 70

Number of Audio Cues: 70

Sample rate / bit rate: (44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs)

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes Seamlessly)
